title: Miss Fortune Passive Sound Bug
body: When playing arcade Miss Fortune and there is a Cait in the game, Miss Fortune's passive sound changes to be the sound of cait's q hitting a target.  Quite annoying.

replies.body:
Hey Sabryce,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this issue and are working on a fix!
I noticed this too! But I wasn't Playing Her, I was mid, and she used her W and whenever it would Reset it would make the sound of the Piltover Peacemaker, I thought it was reallly weird....
